Boeing Research & Technology | 3D Designer - Unreal Engine | Brisbane | ONSITE

Hi folks. Interested in building the future of aviation? Come join a mixed reality research and development team within The Boeing Company, based in Australia.

The successful applicant will work within a small team of mixed reality specialists who are tasked with developing innovative enabling technologies for application within new and existing Boeing products and programs. The researcher will perform a variety of research activities focused predominantly within the field of Virtual Reality. Applicants must be Australian Citizens to meet defence security requirements.

Submit a resume and link to a portfolio here [1]. Applications still open.

[1] https://recruit.boeing.com.au/jobtools/jncustomsearch.viewFu...
